main event: An unidentified bright, luminous object was observed in the sky over Burlison, Texas on December 6, 1954.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 15 to 20 minutes.
The object was described as spherical, bright, and luminous.
The object changed colors from red to blue to white.
The object remained stationary and then suddenly disappeared from view.
No other details are available at this time, and the report has been forwarded to the Directorate of Intelligence for further analysis and evaluation.
photographs: no photographs included in the report
